products.name: HGST - Travelstar 5K1000 1TB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Laptops (OEM/Bare Drive)

products.name: WD - Red 1TB Internal SATA NAS Hard Drive (OEM/Bare Drive)
products.longDescription: Expand your network storage with this 1TB WD Red WD10JFCX internal hard drive, which runs at a low temperature for added reliability. The drive reduces data loss by completing the command in process before shutting down in the event of a power failure.

products.name: WD - Blue 750GB Internal Serial ATA Hard Drive for Laptops (OEM/Bare Drive)
products.longDescription: Store your favorite photos, music, films and more on this WD Blue WD7500BPVXSP internal hard drive, which features 750GB of space. NoTouch Ramp Load technology and StableTrac technology offer reliability in your laptop.

products.name: WD - Red 4TB Internal SATA Hard Drive (OEM/Bare Drive)
products.longDescription: This WD Red WD40EFRX internal hard drive is designed for NAS systems with 1-8 drive bays in both 3.5" form factors. Its 4TB capacity provides plenty of space to house files, and the Serial ATA interface lets you connect your laptop or desktop.

products.name: WD - Black 2TB Internal Serial ATA Hard Drive (OEM/Bare Drive)
products.longDescription: This WD Black WD2003FZEX internal hard drive safeguards up to 2TB of digital data with Corruption Protection technology, which limits data loss during a power failure. StableTrac technology reduces system-induced vibrations for increased performance.

products.name: WD - Black 1TB Internal Serial ATA Hard Drive (OEM/Bare Drive)
products.longDescription: This WD Black WD1003FZEX SATA internal hard drive provides 1TB of storage, so you can easily house plenty of pictures, videos, music and other important files on your Windows or Mac desktop.

products.name: WD - Blue 500GB Internal SATA Hard Drive
products.longDescription: Build extra application space into your laptop with this WD Blue internal hard drive, featuring 6 GB/s transfers speeds for reliable performance. products.name: WD - Blue 500GB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Desktops
products.longDescription: Beef up your desktop or laptop computer's performance with this WD Blue internal hard drive. This WD Blue internal hard drive features NoTouch Ramp Load technology, extending the life of the recording head.

products.name: WD - NAS 4TB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Desktops
products.longDescription: Add extra storage to your network attached storage with this Western Digital 4TB NAS hard drive. products.name: WD - Surveillance 4TB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Desktops

products.name: WD - Blue 4TB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Desktops

products.name: WD - Blue 500GB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Desktops

products.name: Toshiba - 4TB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Desktops

products.name: Toshiba - 1TB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Desktops

products.name: Toshiba - 6TB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Desktops

products.name: WD - Blue 1TB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Desktops
products.longDescription: Secure important documents and high-resolution files with this Western Digital Blue PC hard drive. Its NoTouch ramp load technology keeps the recording head in a safe position off the disk surface to prevent drive damage and protect stored data. This 1TB Western Digital Blue PC hard drive optimizes read operations with its 64MB cache memory.

products.name: WD - Blue 3TB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Desktops
products.longDescription: Keep precious files safe and accessible with this Western Digital Blue PC hard drive. products.name: WD - Blue 6TB Internal SATA Hard Drive for Desktops

products.name: WD - Red Pro 2TB Internal SATA NAS Hard Drive for Desktops

products.name: Seagate - FireCuda 1TB Internal SATA Hybrid Hard Drive for Desktops
products.longDescription: Enjoy both speed and high capacity with this 1TB Seagate FireCuda solid state hybrid drive. products.name: Seagate - FireCuda 2TB Internal SATA Hybrid Hard Drive for Desktops
